title: Did Trump Say ‘Laziness Is a Trait in Blacks; No Black President Again Any Time Soon’?
subtitle: A meme created the impression that Donald Trump claimed that there wouldn't be a black president again any time soon because 'laziness is a trait in blacks.'
author: David Emery
vclaim: Donald Trump said, "Laziness is a trait in blacks ... I believe that. No black person will be president again any time soon."
